itemInfo.itemDesc:
An outfit that was made for Gathering.

- Item Effect: Monsters won’t attack first
 while Squatting or Gathering.
 Monsters won’t notice you while Crawling.
 (Watchtowers and a few other enemies may still attack.)

※ If you use a Costume Exchange Coupon, it can be worn as an outfit.

If you exchange it for an outfit, you cannot register it in the Marketplace.
